Reviews: I recently got this Full Body Electric Massager, and it's been absolutely fantastic for unwinding after a long day. It's super easy to use and really effective at relieving muscle tension all over the body. The different settings are great for customizing the intensity depending on how gentle or powerful you want the massage to be.It's lightweight and portable, which means I can take it anywhere with me, even on trips. If you’re looking for a reliable massager that offers full-body relief, this one is definitely worth considering!
So helpful product of body massage of jiont pains and muscle relaxation .itIs very handy and different modes , which makes it unique and easy to use as per the individual preference

"The product was working fine at the time of purchase, but after 2 months, it stopped working. When I try to charge it, the light blinks, but then it won't work. It suddenly turns on by itself and I'm unable to turn it off. It's a waste of money, please don't buy it."

This product is really good. But the only thing I didn't like is- I ordered it in PURPLE and it arrived in PINK. It was still good. Relieved my neck pains.But, now...The light doesn't blink while charging as shown. Stops all of a sudden. And doesn't start.
It’s annoying how you have to charge for 2-3 hrs but you could only use it for 1 hr.
Very good massager for every area of body, help to relax fully with different vibration modes for different intensities and feelings. Waterproof and easy to handle. Super battery life
Color is as shown in amazon picture. how long it will work only god knows since its Chinese product .Battery life is ok but makes sound. Overall its good.
